svg.title: DP-06: Intelligent Resource Allocation & Optimization Engine
svg.desc: Advanced resource optimization system that dynamically allocates team members, skills, and time across projects while maximizing productivity and maintaining work-life balance through intelligent analysis and automated workload balancing.
svg.text: Advanced resource optimization system with dynamic allocation, skill matching, and automated workload balancing for maximum productivity
Dynamic planning • Intelligent allocation • Team wellness • Real-time optimization

g.text: 📱 PWA-Optimized • 🧠 AI-Enhanced • ⚖️ Dynamic Balancing • ♿ WCAG 2.1 AA Compliant
Resource Intelligence: 85% utilization efficiency with 234% ROI
